The [Zenodo Community "Resources of ICPMF"](https://zenodo.org/communities/icpmf/) is intended to make available to users from **Academia**, **Government** and **Industry** any kind of material concerning predictive modelling in food, including book of abstracts, conference presentations, videos, model files, reports, scientific articles, etc.

[Resources of ICPMF](https://zenodo.org/communities/icpmf/) intends to be a repository of the last achievements and advances for the modeller community and general public, thus increasing visibility and encouraging their application. If you would like to upload on our Community any material relevant to ICPMF, contact the ICPMF Chair.
